pageProps.content: ["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["CentOS 7 已于 2024 年 6 月 30 日结束维护，我们强烈建议立即迁移到其他解决方案。如有需要继续使用 CentOS，请查阅 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/centos-vault/","children":"CentOS Vault"}]," 帮助。"]}],"\n",["$r","p",null,{"children":["CentOS Stream 相关镜像见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/centos-stream/","children":"CentOS Stream"}]," 帮助。"]}]]}]
